text:
Devin was about to get married. Rose loved to laugh and dance with her grandchildren. Zlatko had survived the September 11 attacks. 

These are just a few of the more than 122,000 lives we have lost to coronavirus. My heart aches for their families. 
https://t.co/zdghL40kpE
